definition: exactly/in good order/whole/complete/entire/in order/orderly/to repair/to mend/to renovate/(coll.) to fix sb/to give sb a hard time/to mess with sb
first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive
whole entity/entire body/synthesis/as a whole (situation, construction, team etc)/global/macrocosm/integral/holistic/whole
to bring under control/to regulate/to restore to good condition/(coll.) to fix (a person)/to prepare (a meal etc)
to arrange/to tidy up/to sort out/to straighten out/to list systematically/to collate (data, files)/to pack (luggage)
to tidy up/to reorganize/to consolidate/to rectify
shaping/reshaping/plastic surgery or orthopedics (abbr. of 整形外科[zheng3 xing2 wai4 ke1])

sentences.english: They are the five problems listed above.
sentences.chinese: 就是整上面講的那五個字。

sentences.english: On the uniqueness of entire functions;
sentences.chinese: 研究了一類整函數的擬素性。

sentences.english: Prices for synthetic bristles haven't changed much all these years.
sentences.chinese: 價格爲綜合性的剛毛沒有整這些數年多改變。

sentences.english: A full set of static only perseverance, two months can first efficacy.
sentences.chinese: 整一套靜止只有鍥而不捨，兩個月就可初見功效。

sentences.english: You must cut off one pound of flesh.
We explore the solution of non-linear mixed integer programming problem(NMIP).
sentences.chinese: 主要對非線性混合整規劃問題的求解進行探討。

sentences.english: Who wants this in the entire Games things and Chinese rivalry, that is, court death.
sentences.chinese: 誰想在整運動會這件事上和中國人較勁，那就是找死。

sentences.english: Surveillance and preventive measures have been stepped up to the serious response level in public hospitals.
sentences.chinese: 公共醫院整在加強針對此次事件的監控和防護措施。

sentences.english: The figures in the table are rounded to the nearest ton.
sentences.chinese: 表中的數字四捨五入到最接近的整噸數。

sentences.english: He worked himself to death, finally and precisely, at 3:00 A.M. Sunday morning.
sentences.chinese: 終於，他工作致死於星期天凌晨三點整。

sentences.english: This article may be re-printed in its entirety, with no changes and this resource box included.
sentences.chinese: 這篇文章可能重新印刷整，沒有變化，這包括資源箱。

sentences.english: Watches made from top quality leather will look sharp in any occasion.
sentences.chinese: 手錶製成優質皮革看起來整在任何場合。

sentences.english: On the seventeenth day of the month, he started pulling once more round the clock .
sentences.chinese: 十七那天，他開始去拉車，賃的是“整天兒”。

sentences.english: Let's see here. Your total would be 5929 dollars.
sentences.chinese: 讓我看一下，你的總數是五千九百二十九美元整。

sentences.english: Lightweight and non-greasy, it absorbs quickly and keeps skin hrated all day.
sentences.chinese: 質地輕巧不清淡，汲取急速，皮膚整潤澤。

sentences.english: I get the house all shipshape while he is away.
sentences.chinese: 他不在的時候，我把房子打掃得乾乾淨淨，整整潔齊。
